text: The 1020s BC is a decade which lasted from 1029 BC to 1020 BC. ==Events and trends== * 1027 BC — Traditional date for the end of the Shang Dynasty in China, and the beginning of the Zhou Dynasty. * 1026 BC — Saul the King becomes the first king of the Israelites. * c. 1025 BC — Collapse of Mycenaean dominance ends. * c. 1020 BC — destruction of Troy. ==Births== * 1027 BC - Zhao of Zhou
title: 1020s BC
